title: Questor: if property really is ‘the best income asset’, why don’t we have more in our portfolio?
text:
Questor Income Portfolio: although property seems to offer unrivalled income stability, we have limited our exposure to just two funds – for good reason

Today we will pick up on the striking opinion we quoted in yesterday’s column: that the best investment for income investors is property.

The quote, from the manager of a Canadian income-focused fund, is bound to be of interest to followers of the Questor Income Portfolio. It’s worth looking at what exactly makes property so special.
